title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Curriculum for Computing Thinking (CT) Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can explain methods for integrating core computational thinking (CT) concepts (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithmic thinking) into language education.
Participants can propose two or more specific strategies for designing plugged/unplugged CT activities in language classes.
Participants can analyze the relationship between school culture (collaboration/resources) and CT teaching self-efficacy, then develop improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
